channel.title: [Delta base] Pk points
channel.description:
Yo guys.. i wanna add counter that count how much ppl u kill
if i kill 2 ppl i get 2 points and when i do ::pkpoints i get how much points i have
***** i want the points be saved at charcter file not when player logout it rest !!!*****************
[size=18pt][center][b]IM USING DELTA BASE[/size][/center][/b]
[br][br][size=1]Posted on: July 05, 2009, 04:21:28 pm[/size][hr]omg how to make that system !! ffs
